text:
(a)     Establishment of Fund. The Board of Supervisors Outreach Advertising Revenue Fund is established as a category four fund to receive monies withheld from payments to official newspapers for official advertising, in accordance with Administrative Code Section 
2.81-2(a). 
     (b)     Use of Fund. The Outreach Advertising Revenue Fund shall be used solely to pay for outreach advertising, in accordance with Section 
2.80-1(d). 
(Added by Ord. 316-00, File No. 001911, App. 12/28/2000)

heading.catch_text: BOARD OF SUPERVISORS OUTREACH ADVERTISING REVENUE FUND.
